article_title: Stephen Colbert Pulls "Miley Cyrus" and Twerks with Grim Reaper
article_text:
By Daniel Gates

VIDEO

Stephen Colbert channeled Miley Cyrus on Thursday, twerking with the Grim Reaper in celebration of House Republicans’ threat to shut down the government if Obamacare is not defunded.

Waving a foam finger, wagging his tongue, and grinding on Death, the host looked happier than he’s been since his epic “Get Lucky” dance party over the summer.

No word on whether Robin Thicke was under the mask.

Check out the video below!
